name: Collections Management Analytics App For Business Users
description: Analytical App tailored for Cash Flow Optimization, designed to help identify customers who will promptly settle their debts.

appStages.name: Introduction
Collection-Management Prediction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eCollection-Mangement Prediction\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eUpload collection data and click on \u0027Get Prediction\u0027 to Predict customer payment behavior and viewing results with predictive analytics charts.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n     \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n   \u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "keyModified": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Upload Data",
      "description": "Upload Collection Data as CSV file",
      "customClass": "icon-green transparent m-4",
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "key": "file",
      "type": "file",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",

    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Feature Selection",
              "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "disabled": true,
              "tableView": false,
              "defaultValue": {
                "USAGE_SCORE": true,
                "EMP_CNT": true,
                "CUSTOMER_REVENUE": true,
                "COMMENT_LENGTH": true,
                "TOTAL_AMOUNT": true,
                "BALANCE_DUE": true,
                "WRITEOFF_AMT": true,
                "COLLECTION_STATUS": true
              },
              "values": [
                {
                  "label": "Usage Score",
                  "value": "USAGE_SCORE",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Employee Count",
                  "value": "EMP_CNT",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Customer Revenue",
                  "value": "CUSTOMER_REVENUE",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Comment Length",
                  "value": "COMMENT_LENGTH",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Invoice Amount",
                  "value": "TOTAL_AMOUNT",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Balance Due",
                  "value": "BALANCE_DUE",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Writeoff Amount",
                  "value": "WRITEOFF_AMT",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Collection Status",
                  "value": "COLLECTION_STATUS",
                  "shortcut": ""
                }
              ],
              "calculateValue": "debugger;\nif(instance.previousData.modelFeaturesData \u0026\u0026 data.model){\n  featureData \u003d instance.previousData.modelFeaturesData.filter(res\u003d\u003e{\n    if(res.name \u003d\u003d data.model \u0026\u0026 res.path \u003d\u003d data.model) {\n        return res;\n    }\n  });\n  value \u003d featureData[0].features;\n}",
              "validate": {
                "required": true
              },
              "key": "featureSelection_wf_6",
              "properties": {
                "isMlFeatures": "true"
              },
              "type": "selectboxes",
              "redrawOn": "model",
              "input": true,
              "inputType": "checkbox",
              "hideOnChildrenHidden": false,
              "refreshOn": "model",
              "keyModified": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,

          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
